attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager JP Thomas and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vanderbijlpark.

KIA DEALER OF THE YEAR - 2022
We the Kia Konfidence Edenvale team pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our esteemed clients.
